meanings.definition: Jewish musicians who play traditional Eastern European music.
meanings.sent1: The klezmorim performed at the synagogue during the holiday.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to the klezmorim play their instruments.
meanings.sent3: The klezmorim decided to start a band called 'Matzo Melodies'.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the klezmorim's music filled the air like a joyful dance.
meanings.sent5: The klezmorim's melodies echoed through the streets, bringing smiles to everyone.

meanings.definition: A group of klezmer musicians performing at a wedding.
meanings.sent1: The klezmorim played beautiful music at the wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent2: Guests danced joyfully to the tunes of the klezmorim.
meanings.sent3: The klezmorim accidentally played the wedding march backwards.
meanings.sent4: The presence of the klezmorim added a touch of tradition to the modern wedding.
meanings.sent5: The bride and groom thanked the klezmorim for making their day special with music.

meanings.definition: The klezmer band played lively music at the festival.

meanings.sent2: The festival atmosphere was vibrant with the sounds of the klezmorim.
meanings.sent3: The klezmorim's music was so lively that even the birds started dancing.
meanings.sent4: The energy of the klezmorim's performance was contagious, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The festival organizers praised the klezmorim for their fantastic show.

meanings.definition: The klezmorim entertained the guests with their energetic performance.
meanings.sent1: The klezmorim's music brought smiles to the faces of the audience.
meanings.sent2: The guests clapped along to the rhythm of the klezmorim's music.
meanings.sent3: The klezmorim's energetic performance even made the shyest guest dance.
meanings.sent4: The joy in the room grew as the klezmorim continued to play.
meanings.sent5: The guests couldn't resist tapping their feet to the klezmorim's lively tunes.
